casebody.data:
SENIOR RIDE CONNECTION, f/k/a ITNCharleston Trident, Appellant,
v.
ITNAMERICA, Respondent. Appellate Case No. 2017-000024 Court of Appeals of South Carolina. September 8, 2017

ORDER

It appears to the satisfaction of the Court that the above case has been fully and finally settled by agreement between the parties. Accordingly, this matter is dismissed. The remittitur will be sent as provided by Rule 221(b) of the South Carolina Appellate Court Rules.
